item.title: EIF1

item.title: FaRIF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g20700 Gene Symbol: FaRIF|FaNAC035 Gene Name: Ripening Inducing Factor Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The NAC transcription factor FaRIF|FaNAC035 controls fruit ripening in strawberry.

item.title: FaTPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaTPK1 Gene Name: two-pore potassium channel 1-like Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Description: FaTPK1 increased rapidly and was maintained at a high level in ripened fruit, which was coupled with the fruit’s red colour development, suggesting that FaTPK1 is related to fruit quality formation.

item.title: FveMYB10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22020 Gene Symbol: FveMYB10 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 10 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB transcription factor FveMYB10 is a major regulator of anthocyanin pigmentation in the red fruits of strawberry.

item.title: FveMYB10L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_1g22040 Gene Symbol: FveMYB10L Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 10 Like Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Using mapping-by-sequencing and transient functional assays, we confirmed that the causative mutation resides in a FveMYB10-Like (FveMYB10L) gene and that FveMYB10 and FveMYB10L function independently in the fruit and petiole, respectively.

item.title: PbrSTONE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr005042 Gene Symbol: PbrSTONE Gene Name: Genome: Pyrus bretschneideri genome Species: Pyrus pyrifolia Functional Description: One candidate gene, PbrSTONE, identified in GWAS, has been functionally verified to be involved in the regulation of stone cell formation, one of the most important fruit quality traits in pear.

item.title: PdGA20ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PdGA20ox1 Gene Name: gibberellin 20-oxidase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus densiflora Functional Descriptions: Wood forming tissue-specific bicistronic expression of PdGA20ox1 and PtrMYB221 improves both the quality and quantity of woody biomass production in a hybrid poplar.

item.title: PhACO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhACO1 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate oxidase1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: PhACO1 was subsequently edited using the CRISPR/Cas9 system, and its role in ethylene production was investigated.

item.title: PhACO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhACO1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Petunia inflata Functional Description: this study increases the understanding of the role of PhACO1 in petunia flower longevity and also points to the CRISPR/Cas9 system being a powerful tool in the improvement of floricultural quality.
